title: There Will Be No Integration
author: VD
content_html:
The migrants are being naturally selected for conquest and predation, not a better life through integration:

Imagine a fleet of large trucks arriving every week in villages all throughout subsaharan west Africa – countries like Gabon, Togo, Niger, Burkino Faso, and Guinea-Bissau Men aged 18-30 would be picked up, given phones, money, clothes, and some food and hauled up through the sahara desert with promises of reaching the El Dorado that is Europe for free handouts and the pick of any white women they want.

Let’s say on any particular day 10 men from 10 villages were picked up, filling a truck to 100 capacity. By the time the truck made it to Tripoli, half of them were dead, either through fighting, being left in the desert, hijacked by other traffickers.

So now you’ve got 50 of that original 100 in Tripoli, but they’ve got to make it to the port, avoid open slave markets, militia, drug gangs, and street bombings. Let’s halve that again, and now you’ve got 25 military aged African men at the Southern coast of the mediterranean. They get stuffed in a boat with the surviving 25 from other trucks, money exchanges hands from one trafficking group to the next to the next at each leg of the journey. The rubber dinghy goes across the sea and as its reaching the South of Spain or Italy it starts to sink. Some of the guys have already expired from dehydration, many of them find out they don’t know how to swim.

5 of the original 100 that were picked up in Niger have made it to Spain. Now imagine what those 5 guys are like: They would be hard, ruthless, brutal motherfuckers And what they want is what they’ve been promised. Your land, your culture, your women, your daughters, your money, your food, your drugs They don’t give a fuck about you or anything you represent, and they certainly aren’t asylum seekers They want to rape your women, piss on your idols, attack your young boys, and run your streets, and they feel like they’ve earned it.

These migrants have gone through their own personal hell to get to Europe so they feel completely entitled to the spoils of their journey.

No only are the USA, the UK, and Europe not going to vote their way out of the invasions, they’re not going to be able to escape the inevitable violence that will determine who rules whom.

DISCUSS ON SG

are being naturally selected

DISCUSS ON SG
